name: Ignore
matches: ^He is benefitting from a \d+\% bonus to experience gain\.$
^She is benefitting from a \d+\% bonus to experience gain\.$
She is enchanted against fire damage.
He is enchanted against fire damage.
You walk with the grace of the relic Lifegiver.
Illuminated by the light of the moon.
The vitality of the boar is energising you.
She is feeling quite selfish.
He is feeling quite selfish.
Her body is weathering the storm of life a little better.
His body is weathering the storm of life a little better.
She is resisting magical damage.
He is resisting magical damage.
He is walking with the grace of the stars.
She is walking with the grace of the stars.
His vision is heightened to see in the dark.
Her vision is heightened to see in the dark.
His actions are cloaked in secrecy.
Her actions are cloaked in secrecy.
He is acknowledged by Jy'Barrak Golgotha, Emperor of Chaos.
She is acknowledged by Jy'Barrak Golgotha, Emperor of Chaos.
You are able to scout passed obstructions.
His skin is hard and tough like the bark of an oak tree.
Her skin is hard and tough like the bark of an oak tree.
He is concentrating on clotting his wounds.
She is concentrating on clotting her wounds.
He has used great guile to conceal himself.
She has used great guile to conceal herself.
He is able to navigate forests more easily.
She is able to navigate forests more easily.
A jaguar spirit co-habits your body.
He will call upon his fortitude in need.
She will call upon her fortitude in need.
His senses are attuned to nearby movement.
Her senses are attuned to nearby movement.
The devilmark is upon his breast.
The devilmark is upon her breast.
He is aware of movement in the skies.
She is aware of movement in the skies.
He is aware of movement on the ground.
She is aware of movement on the ground.
He is watching the trees or rigging above for signs of movement.
She is watching the trees or rigging above for signs of movement.
He has distorted his own aura.
She has distorted her own aura.
The spirit of a Chaos Lord lies dormant in his soul.
The spirit of a Chaos Lord lies dormant in her soul.
He has accepted a blessing for aid in times of need.
She has accepted a blessing for aid in times of need.
He is focussing on quelling his bleeding more efficiently.
